attributes.action: Stop Paypal holding money after sales for up to 180days
attributes.additional_details:
We need change in the way Paypal holds transaction money on sales through eBay for items that have been sold you can send your item recorded signed for by Royal mail with a tracking number the item is then received by the buyer at this point the transaction has been completed and after all of this Paypal still hold your funds for up to 180 days. 

Its this right?

Its time to stand up and stand together to stop this.

Thank you for reading
attributes.background:
PAYPAL: The simpler, safer way to pay and get paid!!!!! At least that’s what the company claims.

Then how can there hold you money for up to 180 days

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Paypal, not the UK Government or Parliament.
